p: Two important features of ILINet data to consider in models and forecast evaluation are 1. timeliness and accuracy of initial wILI values for each week and subsequent updates to these values, and 2. changes in behavior on and around major holidays. We examine these details of the data generation process, describe how they are addressed in the delta density model, and demonstrate the importance of considering the update procedure when performing retrospective evaluation and prospective forecasting.
